other_tests.findings: Generalized skin edema, bilateral pleural effusions, and peritoneal effusions in the fetus. Normal Doppler, normal placenta, and amniotic fluid without structural anomalies or signs of fetal anemia.
Normal male karyotype and no alterations in the copy number variations (CNVs) test.
Revealed two homozygous variants in the GUSB gene and one in the CHD7 gene. Identification of a homozygous missense variant c.1324G > A in exon 8 of the GUSB gene, predicted to be deleterious.
Revealed the presence of the GUSB gene mutation in the previous edema fetus.
